issue.title: [C++] Fix nightly builds with 'std::stringstream ss' has incomplete type and cannot be defined
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16494](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16494). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some nightly packaging jobs have failed with the following error:
```java

/build/arrow-cpp-ext_1651835658881/work/cpp/src/arrow/dataset/file_csv.cc:91:25: error: aggregate 'std::stringstream ss' has incomplete type and cannot be defined
   91 |       std::stringstream ss; 
```
This was introduced on https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16436
